declarations.description:
A vanilla JavaScript web component that simulates a terminal console with
customizable commands, themes, cursor styles, and typing effects.
declarations.name: TerminalWindow

slots.description: Custom content for the terminal title in the header
slots.name: title

slots.description: Custom buttons/actions before the theme and copy buttons
slots.name: actions

slots.description: Content inserted before the output area in the terminal body
slots.name: before-output

members.name: _applyAttributes
members.description: Apply initial attributes

members.name: _updateStyles
members.description: Update dynamic styles

members.name: _updateHeaderVisibility
members.description: Update header visibility

members.name: _updateTitle
members.description: Update title

members.name: _updateControlsVisibility
members.description: Update window controls visibility

members.name: _updateCopyVisibility
members.description: Update copy button visibility

members.name: _updateThemeToggleVisibility
members.description: Update theme toggle visibility

members.name: _updateReadonlyState
members.description: Update readonly state

members.name: _registerVfsCommands
members.description: Register VFS commands

members.name: _registerBuiltInCommands
members.description: Register built-in commands

members.name: registerCommand

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: Function that receives (args: string[], terminal: TerminalWindow) and returns string|null|Promise

members.description:
Register a custom command handler.
The handler receives an array of arguments and the terminal instance,
and can return a string to print, null to suppress output, or a Promise for async commands.

members.name: unregisterCommand
members.description: Remove a registered command.

members.name: registerAlias

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: Full command string to execute when alias is used

members.description: Create an alias for a command.

members.name: executeCommand

parameters.name: addToHistory
parameters.description: Whether to add to command history

members.description: Execute a command string programmatically.

members.name: executeSequence

parameters.name: commands
parameters.description: Array of command strings or objects with command and optional delay

parameters.name: defaultDelay
parameters.description: Default delay between commands in milliseconds

members.description:
Execute multiple commands with delays between them.
Useful for demos, presentations, or scripted terminal sequences.

members.name: _printCommandLine
members.description: Print command line to output

members.name: print
members.description:
Print text to the terminal.
Supports multiple lines (splits on \n) and ANSI color codes.

members.name: _prefersReducedMotion
members.description:
Check if user prefers reduced motion
Can be overridden with forceAnimations config for testing

members.name: _processTypingQueue
members.description: Process queued typing effect prints

members.name: _trimOutputIfNeeded
members.description: Trim output lines if exceeding max

members.name: _renderWithTypingEffect
members.description: Render output with typing effect

members.name: skipTypingEffect
members.description:
Skip the current typing animation and show all remaining output immediately.
This is also triggered when the user presses Ctrl+C or clicks the terminal during a typing effect.

members.name: _delay
members.description: Delay helper for typing effect

members.name: clear
members.description: Clear all terminal output.

members.name: _parseAnsi
members.description: Parse ANSI escape codes and convert to HTML

members.name: _appendLineToDom
members.description: Append a single line to the DOM

members.name: _renderOutput
members.description: Render the output area

members.name: _isNearBottom
members.description: Check if terminal is scrolled near the bottom

members.name: _handleScroll
members.description: Handle scroll events for smart auto-scroll

members.name: _scrollToBottom
members.description: Scroll to bottom of terminal (respects auto-scroll setting)

members.name: scrollToBottom
members.description:
Force scroll to the bottom of the terminal.
The terminal uses smart auto-scroll: it automatically scrolls when new output appears,
but stops if the user scrolls up to read previous content. This method forces a scroll
and re-enables auto-scroll.

members.name: _escapeHtml
members.description: Escape HTML for safe display

members.name: _announce
members.description: Announce message to screen readers

members.name: _setupEventListeners
members.description: Setup event listeners

members.name: _navigateHistory
members.description: Navigate command history

members.name: _autocomplete
members.description: Autocomplete command

members.name: _updateInputDisplay
members.description: Update the visible input display

members.name: _focusInput
members.description: Focus the hidden input

members.name: setInputMask
members.description:
Enable or disable input masking for password prompts.
When masked, input is displayed as asterisks (***) instead of the actual characters.

members.name: copyContent

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Copy mode: "all" (everything with prompts), "commands" (only commands entered), "output" (only output, no commands), "selection" (current text selection)

members.description: Copy terminal content to clipboard.

members.name: _copyToClipboard
members.description: Internal method to copy text to clipboard

members.name: _toggleCopyMenu
members.description: Toggle copy menu visibility

members.name: _openCopyMenu
members.description: Open the copy menu with keyboard support

members.name: _closeCopyMenu
members.description: Close the copy menu and return focus

members.name: _handleCopyMenuKeydown
members.description: Handle keyboard navigation in copy menu

members.name: _showCopyFeedback
members.description: Show copy feedback

members.name: toggleTheme
members.description:
Toggle between light and dark theme.
Announces the theme change to screen readers and fires no events (use attribute observation for reactivity).

members.name: close
members.description:
Close the terminal by hiding it.
Sets `display: none` on the element and dispatches a `close` event.
The terminal can be shown again by setting `display: block` or removing the style.

members.name: minimize
members.description:
Toggle the minimized state of the terminal.
When minimized, only the header is visible. Dispatches a `minimize` event with the new state.

members.name: toggleFullscreen
members.description:
Toggle fullscreen mode (maximize).
When fullscreen, the terminal fills the entire viewport. Press Escape to exit.
Dispatches a `fullscreen` event with the new state.

members.name: setTheme
members.description: Set the color theme programmatically.

members.name: setPrompt
members.description: Set the command prompt text programmatically.

members.name: setCursorStyle
members.description: Set the cursor style programmatically.

members.name: setCursorBlink
members.description: Enable or disable cursor blinking programmatically.

members.name: setTypingEffect

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Whether to enable the typing effect

members.description:
Enable or disable the typing effect for output.
When enabled, printed text appears character by character like a typewriter.
Respects `prefers-reduced-motion` unless `force-animations` is set.

members.name: setReadonly
members.description:
Enable or disable readonly mode.
When readonly, the input line is hidden and users cannot type commands.
Useful for presentation or demonstration purposes.

members.name: setForceAnimations

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: If true, animations will run regardless of system preference

members.description:
Override the user's `prefers-reduced-motion` system preference.
When forced, typing animations will run even if the user has reduced motion enabled.
Use sparingly and only for testing or when the animation is essential to the experience.

members.name: hasReducedMotion
members.description:
Check if the user has enabled `prefers-reduced-motion` in their system settings.
When true, the terminal will skip typing animations unless `force-animations` is set.

members.name: setI18n

parameters.name: strings
parameters.description: Object containing string keys to override

type.text:
@param {string} [strings.copy] - "Copy" button text
   * @param {string} [strings.close] - "Close" button tooltip
   * @param {string} [strings.minimize] - "Minimize" button tooltip
   * @param {string} [strings.maximize] - "Maximize" button tooltip
   * @param {string} [strings.toggleTheme] - "Toggle theme" button tooltip
   * @param {string} [strings.copyAll] - "Copy All" menu item
   * @param {string} [strings.copyCommandsOnly] - "Copy Commands Only" menu item
   * @param {string} [strings.copyOutputOnly] - "Copy Output Only" menu item
   * @param {string} [strings.copied] - "Copied!" feedback message
   * @param {string} [strings.commandNotFound] - "Command not found" error message
   *

members.description:
Set internationalization (i18n) strings for localization.
Merges the provided strings with the existing defaults.
Triggers a re-render to apply the new strings.

members.name: getI18n
members.description: Get a copy of the current i18n strings configuration.

members.name: _t
members.description: Get a localized string

members.name: getHistory
members.description:
Get the command history array.
Returns a copy of the history, not a reference to the internal array.

members.name: setHistory

parameters.name: history
parameters.description: Array of commands to set as history

members.description:
Replace the command history with a new array.
Useful for restoring history from storage or initializing with predefined commands.

members.name: clearHistory
members.description:
Clear all command history.
If `persist-history` is enabled, also clears the localStorage entry.

members.name: getContent
members.description:
Get all terminal output as plain text.
Includes both commands (with prompts) and output lines.

members.name: focus
members.description:
Focus the terminal's input field.
Useful after programmatically interacting with the terminal.

members.name: render
members.description: Render the component

members.name: config
members.default: { theme: 'dark', prompt: '$ ', cursorStyle: 'block', // block, underline, bar cursorBlink: true, fontFamily: "'Consolas', 'Monaco', 'Courier New', monospace", fontSize: '14px', lineHeight: '1.4', typingEffect: false, typingSpeed: 30, // ms per character // Header options showHeader: true, title: 'Terminal', showControls: true, showCopy: true, showThemeToggle: true, // Behavior options readonly: false, maxLines: 1000, // Features enableVfs: false, persistHistory: false, // Accessibility forceAnimations: false, // Override prefers-reduced-motion (for testing only) }

members.name: _i18n
members.default: { // Button labels copy: 'Copy', close: 'Close', minimize: 'Minimize', maximize: 'Maximize', exitFullscreen: 'Exit fullscreen', toggleFullscreen: 'Toggle fullscreen', toggleTheme: 'Toggle theme', switchToLight: 'switch to light', switchToDark: 'switch to dark', // Copy menu copyAll: 'Copy All', copyCommandsOnly: 'Copy Commands Only', copyOutputOnly: 'Copy Output Only', copyOptions: 'Copy options', copied: 'Copied!', nothingToCopy: 'Nothing to copy', noSelection: 'No selection', // Announcements terminalReady: 'Terminal ready', terminalCleared: 'Terminal cleared', terminalClosed: 'Terminal closed', terminalMinimized: 'Terminal minimized', terminalRestored: 'Terminal restored', enteredFullscreen: 'Entered fullscreen mode', exitedFullscreen: 'Exited fullscreen mode', themeChangedTo: 'Theme changed to', copiedToClipboard: 'copied to clipboard', content: 'Content', // Built-in commands availableCommands: 'Available commands:', noCommandsInHistory: 'No commands in history.', commandNotFound: 'Command not found:', typeHelpForCommands: "Type 'help' for available commands.", // Input terminalInputLabel: 'Terminal input. Type a command and press Enter.', terminalOutput: 'Terminal output', }

events.name: command-result
events.description: Fired after a command executes successfully. Detail: { command, args, result }

events.name: command-error
events.description: Fired when a command fails or is not found. Detail: { command, error }

events.name: command
events.description: Fired when a command is executed. Detail: { command, args, input }

events.name: output
events.description: Fired when a line is printed to the terminal. Detail: { type, content }

events.name: copy
events.description: Fired when content is copied to clipboard. Detail: { text, mode }

events.name: close
events.description: Fired when the terminal is closed via the close button

events.name: minimize
events.description: Fired when the terminal is minimized/restored. Detail: { minimized }

events.name: fullscreen
events.description: Fired when fullscreen mode is toggled. Detail: { fullscreen }

attributes.name: typing-speed
attributes.description: Milliseconds per character when typing effect is enabled

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Title displayed in the header bar

attributes.name: show-controls
attributes.description: Show window control buttons (close, minimize, maximize)

attributes.name: show-copy
attributes.description: Show the copy button in the header

attributes.name: max-lines
attributes.description: Maximum number of output lines to keep in buffer

attributes.name: enable-vfs
attributes.description: Enable virtual file system with built-in commands (ls, cd, pwd, mkdir, touch, rm, cat)

attributes.name: persist-history
attributes.description: Persist command history to localStorage across sessions

attributes.name: force-animations
attributes.description: Force typing animations even when user has prefers-reduced-motion set
Welcome message displayed when terminal loads
attributes.name: welcome
